website_summaries.verdict: Test takers who seek quick reinforcement between study sessions will benefit from this flash card collection. Extremely affordable, but still fairly comprehensive.
pros: Strong emphasis on terms and vocabulary
Ideal for quick reviews after using other study guides
Covers a broad array of MCAT test subjects
cons: Downloading and accessing the app is problematic
Flash card material is simplistic, not detailed
Cards not printed on sturdy cardstock

customer_reviews.title: Product received was not what was in the description!
customer_reviews.text: The product description is highly inaccurate. There are only 343 cards. Not 1,000 cards as described. Not 2004 pages as described. Cards only cover Biological and Biochemical Foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G Fair

customer_reviews.title: You guys won’t update the cards?! 2015
customer_reviews.text: After I had bought it I realized it’s a 2015 version!
customer_reviews.author: Amen

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I've used this cards a lot throughout my studies. Overall, I'm very happy with them. They cover a lot of information. I wish that some of the cards had diagrams or photos to example concepts (graphs, charts, etc). I've drawn them on myself in some instances. The app is nice to use when you're on the go so you don't have to lug your cards around. The only thing I don't like about the app is that it doesn't save your progress so you go through cards you've done more than once before you get through the whole deck.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go-- even gives you access to the app!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this for my MCAT prep, honestly used them more than the book because they were so convenient and easily re-inforced major concepts. Small but mighty. The app grants you access if you have bought the set using a verification process of a randomly chosen word from the deck. Wonderful study tool! I also got accepted into medical school, so they definitely worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Make sure if you are going to buy the test prep texts to match the year(s). I'm not sure if it matters or not if off by a year or two, but it doesn't hurt. Cards filled with useful questions. There are a lot.. so don't expect to burn through them rather fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Koussa

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to AAMC flash cards
customer_reviews.text: If you like physical or electronic flash cards, this tool provides both. It was very helpful especially down the stretch toward the actual test day. We bought this after seeing it included in many different top 10 most useful MCAT rest resources, and it is there for a reason. For the money, its hard to beat this tool.
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyS

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR MCAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These combined have helped me study for the MCAT. While I haven't taken the exam yet, having these on the coffee table always gives me the opportunity to study while i'm just lounging watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: lovepig

customer_reviews.title: Fun with friends (sort of)
customer_reviews.text: Some of the answers didn’t quite make sense. We played this using a Trivial Pursuit board (hey this is a patented idea) since the format and six subjects was so conducive to it. Made MCAT review sort of fun until the math questions and equations started to make our brains go into overdrive.
customer_reviews.author: docnyt

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t expect the small size!
customer_reviews.text: They are OK for on the go review. But I didn’t expect them to have this small size. The size is exactly the size of a business card. I started with the behavioral section, and it seems like they are just defining some terms.. I don’t love them much yet! It looks like this is the only option in the market for mcat flashcards
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Young

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent study materials
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son as we will take the MCAT next August. He tells me these are the best study guides available. Anyway they are very thorough and comprehensive. He can use these flashcards whenever he has free time to study
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not representative of the mcat exam but still important info to know
customer_reviews.text: I memorized these cards and STILL didn't do well on the mcat. The mcat assumes that you know these definitions but then you need to apply your knowledge from these cards to passages. They're worth buying but don't spend too much time memorizing notecards, as I did. The real score increase comes from doing practice passages. Good luck to everyone studying for the mcat!
customer_reviews.author: Mmak

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The "flashcards" are not Kaplans greatest study tools. They have good information but the still laack a lot. I am also not a fan of the material the cards are made of, the size of the cards, the font or that these cards are from 2015! I'm not understanding how MCAT books by Kaplan come out every year but the notecards are the same. I'm using the cards but don't depend on these
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Barrons flashcards. These are flimsy paper and ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy the Barrons flashcards. These are flimsy paper and a nightmare to transport. The barrons are heavy card stock, coated, hole punched, and come with a ring to keep them together. The content on these are okay but mainly just definitions--not concepts!
customer_reviews.author: mlyon

customer_reviews.title: Cards are thin
customer_reviews.text: The information on these is great! My son has to study for his test for Med school. The only major problem is that the cards are really thin. With all the studying my son has to to I am worried that these are not going to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle nichols

customer_reviews.title: Kaplan is amazing, I actually recommend registering for the Test prep ...
customer_reviews.text: Kaplan is amazing, I actually recommend registering for the Test prep course through the Kaplan website. They use these materials and they are amazing! For all the people that complain that this is a "useless product" they must only be using the flashcards to study for 7 1/2 hour exam. That by itself is unreasonable. These cards are perfect to review the information when you just need a little quick check. Registering through the online Kaplan course gives you the online version that you can check out on your phone, or iPad. The paper cards are great too if you are somewhere where there is no Wi-Fi. I highly highly highly recommend any One materials for MCAT prep!
customer_reviews.author: •|||||||•

customer_reviews.title: Double Subjects/Missing Subjects--Replacement Requested
customer_reviews.text: The product is compact and thorough. Plus, accessing the online portions are great, too. My significant complain is, when mine arrived, it had a double biology subject and double o. chem. subject and was missing 2 subjects that were supposed to be there. I quickly asked for a replacement, it should be here any day now. Will update if the problem was fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Pahanish

customer_reviews.title: But I loved all of the material it claims to cover
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to crack them open and use them. But I loved all of the material it claims to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ashahermosa

customer_reviews.title: Cards are great and the app is an added functional bonus.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a person planning on the MCAT and wants to make review time more entertaining. The app is the added bonas when you want to make neccessary downtime ( bus rides, waiting for class to start ) more productive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCarrick

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be updated
customer_reviews.text: The version of the cards i got are from 2014. This severly needs to be updated. For sections like physics formulas should be written out and not described just confusing. Also my box was damaged that I was semt very upsetting
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice study cards
customer_reviews.text: Nice flash cards to study with, keep some with you and learn on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Supergod7

customer_reviews.title: If someone is willing to go through the cards then ...
customer_reviews.text: If someone is willing to go through the cards then I suppose they work - but it's a whole lot you might not be able to cover. Make your own flash cards - it's cheaper and more focused.
customer_reviews.author: M.Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I used the app more than the actual cards. The cards are pretty flimsy, but have a nice design. Not the best study tool in the world, but it is nice to get a broad review of concepts. It can also help show you areas you need to focus on.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great For Review!
customer_reviews.text: Easy reading and convenient to carry around and study on the go. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Health Diva

customer_reviews.title: Overall great study tool for cheap
customer_reviews.text: These were fairly cheap and shipped in two days with the student shipping. They are great to study with because they sum up the information well, and they are easy to travel with. My only complaint is they contain the answer in the definition/description and on the opposite side.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great information, thin flashcards
customer_reviews.text: Great accurate information although the flash cards are as thin as notebook paper and did not function as I thought
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great for review for MCAT
customer_reviews.text: Great review set with such a large variety of questions
customer_reviews.author: Elissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep up with should know vocab
customer_reviews.text: I mean their flash cards and a lot of them. If the mcat were a vocab test this would be the best study guide
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: Does not include all topics
customer_reviews.text: Understand that this is NOT an extensive review of the materials. Probably covers 50% of major terms. Just make sure to supplement this with other materials.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Stangl

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Comes with online resources and app so you can practice on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Onesty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing way to test your science knowledge and review for ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing way to test your science knowledge and review for the mcat. I would have paid double this for how amazing this product is.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Goes hand-in-hand with the 7-book set.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cards, and very thorough. Also a great compliment to the 7-book set that Kaplan also sells.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: My niece got them for her birthday and she was ...
customer_reviews.text: My niece got them for her birthday and she was almost as excited over them as she was about the Kaplan MCAT Complete 7 Book Subject Review that she asked her mother for.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Saint

customer_reviews.title: Great review
customer_reviews.text: It’s great review material. But if you want something more insightful you may also need the books to compensate the material.
customer_reviews.author: Luz G Catala

customer_reviews.title: The app is the only reason to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I need to buy the cards in order to get the app. The cell-phone app is the only reason I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: cuylar conly

customer_reviews.title: very clear.
customer_reviews.text: it is really detailed but the cards are really small I feel like I will lose them. but they are really helpful
customer_reviews.author: Ramandeep Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and Service
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and got here very quickly! Will buy from this family owned store again! Even sent with it a hand written note wishing me luck on my MCAT test.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Welte

customer_reviews.title: cant beat it for the price great review tool
customer_reviews.text: these flashcards are pretty good, though they are smaller than i thought they would be. but for the price they are a really good value and there is a lot of cards in all subjects, the app is useful to use when on your phone on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product, still not sure how to get the app though.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great for all subjects but especially PSYCHOLOGY!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set of flashcards. Comes in both as an app and actual flashcards. Really good for review especially for PSYCHOLOGY!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: The product was received in great conditions. Even an unordered candy came in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was received in great conditions. Even an unordered candy came in the box. Thank you! Hopefully this product helps in improving my MCAT score:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, flimsy cards
customer_reviews.text: The cards came very quickly and are very organized. They are a flimsy paper, though, and I was hoping for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Cole

customer_reviews.title: Cheap 2015 version
customer_reviews.text: Great condition, but a little smaller than I would've liked. 2015 version
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Marmolejo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helpful for studying for the new MCAT. Just terms though, not concepts or diagrams
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Covers all the main points and makes refreshing terms/concepts really easy
customer_reviews.author: Madhu

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good help for pre med students
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great help for learning the free-standing questions asked in the MCAT.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil Joboy Rudolf

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. I recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: jash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item at a great price. Good to lrarn with fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel L. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely useful. A variety of topics and concepts to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon R.

customer_reviews.title: One satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product and delivered fast as promised!! I love the updates also!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. It was well packed,neat and complete. Arriving late was the only problem.
customer_reviews.author: tala mobayed

customer_reviews.title: These cards cover everything.
customer_reviews.text: These cards cover everything. I have been studying for a couple months now and I really feel prepared. You should NOT buy these if this is the only material you are going to depend on to take the MCAT exam. Good luck to all of those ready to take the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: wishing for more
customer_reviews.text: cards are printed paper, no lamination, tiny, and are mainly definitions. this is a great starting place and adds well to my other MCAT prep, however i was expecting more. especially for the organic chem section, to have given bond line reaction mechanisms rather than just word definitions of the processes.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Good for reviewing
customer_reviews.text: The cards themselves are quite flimsy and I wish they were multiple choice, but they do help to jog the memory from classes I took a few years ago. I can see these being helpful on the new MCAT too simply for reviewing but this should definitely supplement heavier review materials.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: time management
customer_reviews.text: for someone with a busy life, they are convenient when it comes to studying
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Earl Dabney

customer_reviews.title: App option faulty
customer_reviews.text: The code for the app didn't work. This was the main reason I bought it. Haven't used it nearly as much as I would if I could just pick up my phone/tablet and look at it. In 2016, mobile capability is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are only very light and there is no app associated with them :(
customer_reviews.author: QueenA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cards are a little bit smaller, but it works good
customer_reviews.author: Girlboss Loobanys

customer_reviews.title: Product pushed out too fast
customer_reviews.text: Some terms were just completely unnecessary. Also, many of the cards don't give you nearly enough information about the topic and will hurt you for the MCAT if you dont read into the topics further. Kaplan really tried to force this product out. The old flashcards were much better.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Explanations are not straightforward. I found myself writing my ...
customer_reviews.text: Explanations are not straightforward. I found myself writing my own stuff on the back of the cards to make it easier to understand/memorize. Very cheap and small cards. This product did not live up to my Kaplan expectations.
customer_reviews.author: angelika

customer_reviews.title: Havent taken my Mcat yet but I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Havent taken my Mcat yet but I love it so far. The included app makes it extreamly easy to study on the go and have your flashcards with you.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. My son loves it. He is currently using this to study for is MCAT. I bought this with the complete book set so this is just an add-on on top of the books. You need the complete package in order to study for the MCAT.
customer_reviews.author: John Adams

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: was not impressed. some of the definitions were very broad or they would give away the answer. was expecting a little more. went through them once and put them aside.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Just started studying and already found a typo. There ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started studying and already found a typo. There is a card that incorrectly states that diastereomers have "similar chemical properties." This is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great for refreshing terms or adding more terms to your ...
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful in preparation for the MCAT. Great for refreshing terms or adding more terms to your vocabulary before test day.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Carlson

customer_reviews.title: These were a big disappointment. They are super tiny very thin paper not ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a big disappointment. They are super tiny very thin paper not heavy card stock or anything like a real flash card doubt they would get much use before they were ruined.... Returning them
customer_reviews.author: Mary c.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product for spare time review when on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Blessinger

customer_reviews.title: App Not Released Yet
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviewer, I'm very frustrated that the MCAT2015 app has not yet been released. Why would you advertise "flashcards + app" on the box when the app is not even an option? The only reason I purchased this product was to have a convenient, on-the-go studying option. If I would have known how misleading the advertisement on the box was, I never would have purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Poston

customer_reviews.title: These cards go great with the book set
customer_reviews.text: These cards go great with the book set. The cards are flimsy and fragile, and the definitions are very general. However, I think that works better. Topics like these are not compressible into a tiny flash card because they span a series of subjects. So you can take what the flash card tells you and expand it as much as you can, and verify with the books.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent card system and the app it comes with is incredibly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Does not provide clear instructions on how to access the app
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Kuria

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but they only include terms, and I feel like there are many important terms missing. Also, many cards use the vocab term as part of the definition, so they aren't as challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of words given away in their definitions
customer_reviews.text: The information is useful, but many of the cards give away the word in its description. You can still study by using the word first and testing your knowledge of definitions, but trying to do the other way around will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kaplan MCAT Flashcards + App (Kaplan Test Prep)
